content.detailedDescription: Driving from fallbrook to temecula on my way to pechanga (casino) i saw what i first thought was just another plane (i've seen photograghed and reported many sightings of "orbs" to mufon) but i couldn't see the wings. i was just a few blocks from the casino in the right hand lane and the lane was about to end so i drove very slowly (i had the top down) and looked very carefully and determined that it was a round disk. i have a nikon d50 in the back seat and thought to myself that as soon as i get to the parking lot of the casino i would take some photo's but i had to take my eyes off the object and change lanes and when i looked back it was gone. i pulled into the parking lot and searched the sky to no avail, nothing. then on my way into the casino a small orb the size of a balloon floated by about as high as the street lights. i took some photos with my cell phone (left the nikon in the car) and have been trying to email them to myself but for whatever reason my pos google tmobile phone won't send them. if they come through i'll post 'em (very exiting though it was the first time i ever saw a traditional "flying saucer")
content.summary: Beige disk that dissappered

content.detailedDescription:
I was off of work from tuesday through friday this week taking care of my son who had a mild case of the chicken pox. my wife whom works from home had asked me on this day to go pick up some lunch. it was a nice sunny day and not too cloudy. i walked outside and got in my car. when i was backing out of the driveway i naturally looked back to my right and left to make sure no cars were coming. i don't remember looking to the right, but i know prior to reaching the curb, there was an object i saw out of my left drivers side window that caught my eye. so, i stopped the car (still in the driveway) to observe the object briefly. it was moving north, the same direction that i was backing out of the driveway prevoiusly. it then stopped completely and suddenly and headed south.  i had only seen the object long enough at this point (3-4 secs) to know that it was definitely heading north.  when it moved south it headed in that direction for only about 2-3 seconds. this is when i stepped out of my car to view the object. it then went back to the north, changing direction again for a few more seconds. then appeared to do a two circles and then headed southwest flying in my direction but angled slightly to the south directly towards the sun. 

by now i had been watching the object for around 15 seconds or so. when it started in my direction i then had the best look at the object as it was getting closer to me. it was shaped like a saucer. the color was sort of a light brownish color with a red tint. the bottom of the craft seemed to have more of the red tint then the rest of it did, but was much darken in color than the rest of it.  it was flying probably 50ft lower than most airplanes i see around my house with the exception of the really high planes i see that leave the white smoke trail behind them. i did not see any features on the object like lights or windows or anything like that. it was just sort of a grainy techture. one thing that struck me as being very strange as i was observing the object or craft, it seemed at times to almost fade away and almost be transparent, but not completely, and then it would be completly visable again. it did this two times after it headed in my direction. as it came closer and closer to me i started to lose sight of it in the sunlight as it was headed straight in that direction. the craft was close enough to me that i should have heard some sound from it but i could not hear any noise at all. it was totally silent. i lost sight of it when it flew under the sun. i stayed in my driveway another 10 minutes or so looking for it. i should have seen it once it was out of the sunlight but it was just gone. like it disappeared. i did not see it again.
content.summary: Saw a disc shaped object in the sky to my left while in my car backing out of the driveway.

content.detailedDescription:
I received a phone call from a friend telling me to go outside and check out a bright object in the sky at 10:36pm pst. i looked in a south-western direction from pico rivera, toward long beach, and saw a large bright "star" like object that was flickering several different colors --red, blue, green and white. at first, i brushed it off as a planet, or a large star. my mother, a firm believer in ufo sightings, stood outside to watch the object. she called me outside within 10 minutes and said that it had been moving at a very slow rate, but insisted that it was moving. we didn't hear a sound, so i assumed it was only a planet and tried to convince her of this. i tried to walk inside again when my mom pointed out that this thing was actually moving. i stood out and watched it move further west toward the coast. she was right.
about 20 minutes in, we saw a second bright object, which was smaller and closer to us. this one seemed to be white in color, and it glided from directly under that "star" like object, to the east, and disappeared a moment later. 
the original "star" like object seemed to glide over to the west at an extremely slow rate and moved over about 6 inches in our perspective. we were able to measure that from a pole that was in our view. 35 minutes in, we noticed the flare of the colors dim and watched the object simply fade away and disappear!  
i know of 5 other witnesses to this occurence, in 3 different locations in the l.A. area.
content.summary: Bright star like object over the l.A. sky

content.detailedDescription: Began at 2:05 p.M. ended 2:07 p.M. sounds like metal hard to decsribe closest is a satelite? got louder and louder, my 5 year old had to cover her ears i did not i tryed to listened, it was not a radio, no music.It was grinding metal with slight static high notes enlongated notes and then low, it was repetative? called my neighbor but he was not watching t.V.
content.summary: Television sound interfirence.

content.detailedDescription: While i was visiting my brother in new york, i walked outside to retrive my camera. when i did i noticed an extremely bright "star" shining in the sky. the sky was still light, as it was about 45 min utes before sunset, yet this "star" was incredibly bright. i also noticed tht it was flashing and changing colors from red to blue. i knew that this was not an ordinary star or planet that i was seeing. i quickly grabbed my camera with a 70x zoom and began to zoom in and film this object. to my amazement i clearly saw the object acting as no other celestial object does. the "star" was changing size, shape, colour and luminosity at a very rapid speed. it changed from red to blue to green, from a small bright circle to a large circle with an intricate pattern within it. i continued to film it for five minutes or so, and the whole time it kept moving, shifting and changing shape, size and color!  it was at this point that the star began to fade out from my camera, although it was still clearly visible to the naked eye. it was as if it was no longer enabling me to film it. i tried again to zoom in to the object, but was unsuccessful. during the entirety of the experience i was filled with excitement, wonder and joy. just seeing the "star"  shining in it's great beauty filled me with hope and joy. it was truly exhilerating.
content.summary: I witnessed a bright "star" in sky that was changing colors. when i zoomed in with video i was amazed to see "star" changing color, size and shape.

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were outside in our driveway with our dog. we were looking at stars when we saw a large triangle shaped glowing object with six glowing "balls" inside. it didn't make any noise and didn't move for about 15 seconds or so, then slowly went west until i couldn't see it anymore, that taking approximately 5 or 6 seconds. i had no idea what it was. i wasn't scared of it at all.
content.summary: Ufo was directly overhead, not moving, then slowly went west.

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying on the grass near my house with my wife. we were laying in the sun with our son and looking up at clouds. i saw a solid white speck that wasn't moving in  the sky and pointed it out to my wife. the object stayed there for at least a couple of minutes, and i described my disappointment that i didn't have my binoculars.

 i started to walk home to get my binoculars, and noticed that the object was in a different spot lower in the sky (aprox 60 degrees from horizon) and approximately 20 degrees east of north. i watched it get lower and lower. it was at about a 30 degree angle and starting to go behind some tall trees near my house when i rushed inside to grab binoculars, but i could already tell that i probably would not get them in time. the object appeared to be changing brightness, and was dark against some clouds as it passed in front of them before it dropped behind the trees. it fell like a flat disk flipping and swishing from side to side slightly with a period of about 2 seconds. my final estimate of it's size was about the size of a car.

the entire elapsed time was perhaps 5 minutes from initial sighting to loss. no planes were observed in the sky in the 10 minutes before the sighting. the object appeared to have been moving east less than 10 miles north of my position and falling from a great height, perhaps from orbit.
content.summary: White object in sky appeared motionless then seen to be falling.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were traveling south bound on the west kilpatrick turnpike just east of yukon, ok.  as we passed by the northwest expressway exit we noticed two white lights a mile or more ahead of us which at first glance looked like nothing more than a low flying small airplane heading towards us.  as we got closer we both noticed that this object in the time it took us to get to it had never moved.  in fact, as we got closer and closer we noticed it was hovering over a field just off the highway.  i would say it was less than 100 yards above the ground and less than 50 yards off the highway so we drove right by it.  it was definitely not an airplane because it wasn't moving, but then it wasn't a helicopter either.  i even rolled my window down as we drove by to see if i could hear propellers hoping it was a helicopter but it was completely silent.  it was just before the sun set but the object was too dark to actually see the shape of it.  but, i do know that it did not have wings like an airplane because i was really straining to see wings as we drove by.  we noticed more white lights on the object as we got closer and judging by their arrangement would say it was either in a cylinder or disc shape but that would only be a guess.  there were probably a total of 3 to 4 bright white lights on it.  and occasionally i could make out a tiny red flashing light underneath but it was not a consistent blinking like a plane would be it was more random.  i watched it in the mirror as we passed by and it was still there for as long as i could see it.  it never moved in the 5 or more minutes since we first noticed it.  and i never saw it leave.  surely there are other people out there who saw this.  it would have been very difficult to ignore if you were driving on that highway that night!  there is a small airport just several miles east of where we were, i wonder if they could have picked it up on their radar?
content.summary: Shape was difficult to make out, but the size of a small private jet or helicopter with several white lights and one small red blinking light underneath.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter actually witnessed this event alone tonight. just 2 nights ago, our entire family witnessed these same lights.  they appeared again tonight at about the same time, but this time there were only 2, not 4, extremely bright diamond shaped lights. this time they hovered lower and a bit closer than last time, according to my daughter. i have a feeling they will be making more appearances in this area. we really want to know what's going on...
content.summary: Second sighting of 2 diamond-shaped golden lights in carlsbad, ca

content.detailedDescription: I was at the seaside on island vir near city of zadar in croatia. i was talking with my friends and i raised my eyes up in the sky and i saw a flash of light in a place where wasn't any stars. it lasted for a second or two and when i said that to my friends it was alredy gone. i sad to them i just saw a ufo or something exploded in the sky. i used to see a lot of meteorites and this wasn't like that.
content.summary: Flash of bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for a smoke at around 1:10 am this morning. i was looking at the stars facing southwest, when something caught my eye. i quickly looked over and in 1-2 seconds i saw 4 lights moving at an incredible speed past the roof of my house. i quickly ran around to the side of the house to see what it was.

for the next 2-4 seconds i clearly saw 3 lights forming a triangle speeding across the sky directly south. there was also a light right in the middle of all 3. there was a large distance between the lights, because at the speed they were moving, they stayed in perfect unison probably 5-6 miles apart from each other. 

i'm not sure whether or not these were rim lights to some large craft, but it seems unlikely since the distance between them stayed in a perfect triangle. if this is the case, the craft must have been absolutely huge.

the speed of this object was approximately (and i'm guessing here) 10-15x faster than the airplanes i observed in the sky over the sf bay area during the minutes after the sighting. i can't stress enough that this thing was moving incredibly fast!

the night sky during the event was very hazy, with the lights from san francisco making it hard to see the stars. i lost sight of the object in the haze traveling southward. the lights also appeared to be speeding up.

for the past year, i lived outside the city, and saw many shooting stars during the night and early morning. i am absolutely certain that these lights were not shooting stars. i hope this report is of use to someone.

-cheers
-stuartb
content.summary: Huge triangle of lights seen speed over oakland, ca in the early morning

content.detailedDescription:
was driving south on i-17, some 50 miles north of phoenix, az. both wife and i saw the object as it was falling toward the ground, behind a mountain range, at about a 45 degree angle from our travel direction, or in a southwest direction.  it appeared to be some 5 miles away!  the apparent size was approximately 1/4 the width of the forefinger, when held at arm's length.  i would say it was rather large.
  strangely, i later thought the color of the object was red, but wife thought it was white!  neither of us is color blind!
  at 85 years of age and 82 (wife) we have seen many 'shooting stars' but what made this object different was its size, and lack of a streaming tail.
  the time was about 12:33 am, arizona time, on mar. 27 of this year. we were headed to phoenix to attend a conference.
  i am a wwii marine corps veteran, and participated in 3 pacific island campaigns.
  we noticed the object as soon as it came into our vision at some 50 degrees above the line of the horizon.
  we thought perhaps it was a falling star, but it was rather big, appeared somewhat close, and had no trailing tail.
  it disappeared as it fell beyond the mountain range.
content.summary: Red, falling star?  had no tail behind it.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside looked to the west and saw a round shape thing with flashing red ,blue and yellow lights .
then a little below there was another , the same flashing lights but when the lights flashed there were these silvery things coming out of it . and it looked like those were lined with white lights. 

after they both faded away i felt very tired , like it sucked the energy out of me .
content.summary: Flashing lights , round

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday the 6th (6pm pst) i took the dogs out so the can releive themselves. i was looking for activity in the skies, since it was clear out, not a cloud in the sky. as i was about to head back indoors i saw what looked like star that was not there while i was looking in that direction seconds before. at first it was stationary and shining bright for 10-20 seconds before it faded out. it lit back up approx. 10 seconds later. thats all the motivation i needed to race indoors and grab my hdd and start filming. i filmed for 8-10 minutes as the object slowly headed south/southwest. i had to get some software to edit the final product.
content.summary: High altitude/reflecting sunlight/very high altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was called outside by my son and his friend. i went outside and saw a straight line of orbs in the sky. then it split and it then separated into three different triangles. i then called my husband outside and he witnessed them moving across the sky.  i told my son to grab the camera to see if i could take a picture before it disappeared.  my spouse took the photos and wished i could of zoomed in more. i felt amazed i only heard of these things happening on tv.  i searched the web for a site to report it and here i am.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in las vegas 89183

content.detailedDescription: Last night, april 7, 2010 around 8:45-8:50pm i observed 4 sharp/bright pin sized blinking lights moving in formation. i first noticed them directly west and they moved off at a high rate of speed to the south/southwest. i had my binoculars and tried to make a positive identification if they were aircraft. i could not. there was no other lights attached, no body glow or other distinguishing or familiar markers. tonight, approximately the same time, april 8, 2010, they appeared again, this time witnessed by my wife and daughter. this time i caught them as the came out of the north by north west and crossed the southern horizon at approx 30 degree apex and dissapeared to the south/southwest. again, they moved in a pattern, separated by considerable distance estimating altitude above 5,000ft. this time, with binoculars i did notice a dull red glow accompanying the flashes, however i am convinced they are not conventional aircraft. also, thier speed was such that they crossed the sky in about a quarter of the time that a high altitude aircraft took to cross the same distance. considering the speed, formation and lack of any other lights and no dicernable body shape, i do not believe they were planes, helicopters or other conventional aircraft
content.summary: Formation of 4 blinking lights moving from n to sw

content.detailedDescription:
****in order to rush this report off i will be brief, please contact for amplifying information***

4 large triangle ufo's currently hovering over san diego, ca in the clairmont mesa area, they are now glowing red.  they have merged into one and separated back into 4 again.  wife and 21 year old stepson have eyes on target at this time.  i will be trying to get pics/video as soon as possible.

okay correction she was confused, or i made a mistake the lights were white not red.  white lights. i specifically asked her (as i am a 20+ year u.S. navy combat veteran) if they displayed red lights on left wing, green on right wing, fog landing lights underneath, red light on top of tail section etc...

she said "babe...They were triangle and started as 3...Then 4 then merged into one, then it was 2 white lights "in a linear perspective" (i am still trying to get some amplifying information as to what she meant by linear), i understand that as one white light right behind a 2nd one (she said that they were very close as in right next to one another).  they did not separate back into 4 again.  right now they are remaining as 2 white lights.


i already made a voice report to ruben.

now that i got the initial report off i will do my best to answer your questions.

my wife initially called me at 8:38pm pst from california.  she was on the 15 north freeway heading north from south san diego (around naval base)

she stated that she was driving and noticed 3 rather large triangle shaped craft silently hovering at approx. position angle 4 in the sky as she was south on the 15 north freeway looking north towards clairmont mesa.  this was at dusk initially where she was able to make out a definitive triangle shape.  as darkness settled in the triangles became white lights in the sky merging in and out of 1.

the motion she described as being very slow...Almost at a standstill and hovering.  no sound of propulsion as they were silent.  now we know that miramar marine corp air station lies to the north in the direction she was facing.  she is a san diego, ca native and had never seen any aircraft like that operating in the direction she stated.  she knows (having been married to me long enough as a chief in the u.S. navy) the difference between helicopters and aircraft.

they were floating triangle bricks basically.

her feelings were that of pretty intense nervousness.  she is still a little shaken up by it.  i had always been the sci-fi guy listening to coast to coast am...She would just roll her eyes at my x-files likeness ;-)

but she has now seen something (which kinda sucks cuz i have never gotten to actually see one).  so she is a full believer now.

she broke off contact at approx. 9:30pm san diego, ca time as she had to be somewhere.  but according to her they seemed to be in no hurry to take off or avoid detection so they may still be airborne.
content.summary: Wife watching 4 triangle ufo's glowing red in san diego right now

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dogs at 2 am april 4th. the sky had big cloud patches.
behind one of those patches i saw a very bright light approaching in a horizontal manner. where i live it is usual to see police helicopters. what draw my attention was the speed it had and that it didn't make any sound. absentmindedly i thought the sound might come later (as if it was a supersonic jet!) and i kept looking and waiting for it. but the bright object approached a clearing and then took off as a rocket, leaving a tail of flares  after it, also without a sound. it looked like a shooting star, but in contrary direction. i kept looking for the object, but it was gone.

i was not scared in any moment, since first i thought it was a helicopter. it was first after the event was over that i came to realize that i had seen a flying object that moved in a way that i have neither seen or heard of before.
content.summary: Horizontal bright object took off as a rocket.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on orient road in tampa to get on i-4 and drive west. i glanced up and to the east (i don't know why) and saw a rectangle flying more or less north. i immediately thought of a rectangle my wife and i saw fly north of orlando international airport about 7-8 years ago. i had no idea what it was, but it was not one of ours. i was extremely curious. i kept glancing through trees as i drove to try to keep it in view, but i realized i would not get a good view unless i turned east. i turned east onto hillsborough avenue instead of taking my turn to the west. i was concerned about time, as i had a meeting at 7 pm miles away through traffic. the object was not coal black, but grayish black as though it was partially transmitting light.  it seemed to be about 5000 feet high, but i was unsure of its length and height.  it appeared to be about three of four times as long as it was high and maybe the size of a twin engined commercial jet, but taller. most peculiar was that it appeared to be flat, like a gray flag that did not wave. it appeared to be 4-5 miles away and perhaps 20 degrees above the horizon. i realized that it was foreshortening in length, which meant it was turning to the east, and that i could not catch up. before it started its turn to the east it was moving through roughly 1-2 degrees of arc per second.  i turned around, got back on i-4 this time, and headed west. i could no longer see the object, even in my mirrors. surely someone else saw the thing, as this was rush hour traffic, and it had to cross the path of i-4 from tampa to orlando or maybe just stay on the north side of i-4. i decided to report it to mufon. i did not think to take a picture with my cell phone. it made no sound, nor did it have lights or a contrail.
content.summary: Black rectangle over eastern tampa flying north, turning east toward lakeland, fl.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside at approximently 2:00 am to smoke and seen a bright light hovering or slowly moving toward my direction. it was night shining a light but more like iluminating itself about 30 ft above a neighbors house it took about 2 mins to get closer and as it did i called my younger sister which also witnessed the craft we could tell it was a helicopter or anything like that because we was so close we could not see prepellers or hear any it was just hovering and then slowly moved on til we lost sight of it we also noticed another bright light aabout 10 ft above an apartment across the street which seemed to be just hovering and then 2 more crafts appeared no higher than the street lights at the corner of our block we recorder this one on our camera phone. the light abover the appartment seemed to just disappear. we witnessed these crafts for about 10 min or more. we can assure you it was no plane helicopter or anyhing like that we were so close that we could tell it wasnt nothing of our military the news or the airport.When first seeing this light i couldnt believe it i wasnt sure if i was seeing a ufo or not until it got closer and then thats when i new that it was a ufo i am now a firm believer and no one can change my mind i know what i saw and no one can tell me different.
content.summary: 4 hovering object no more than 30 to 75 ft from me 2 of which iluminateing got on camera.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo over my home sky in van nuys ca  seen at  3-16-10 at 4:00 pm by x17guy. that is me the photog.
content.summary: Ufo over my sky in van nuys ca  seen at  3-16-10 by x17guy.

content.detailedDescription: (ufo) i see ufos over the burbank sky on 4-05-2010 at 5 00 pm seen by x17guy. that is me the photo.
content.summary: I see ufos over the burbank sky on 4-05-2010 at 5 00 pm seen by x17guy.

content.detailedDescription: (ufo) i see ufos over the burbank sky on 4-05-2010 at 5 00 pm seen by x17guy. that is me noelle corey
content.summary: I see ufos over the burbank sky on 4-05-2010 at 5 00 pm seen by x17guy

content.detailedDescription:
This zoomed-in ufo photo was taken on 28 march 2010  2:23 48 pm. it shows a pink colored ufo surrounded by a plasma energy field.

 please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: Colorful ufos in plasma field

content.detailedDescription: Right before i go to bed i scan the skies for stars and anything unusual. i observed a twinkling low in the sky star like object in the southwest skies of oakland county. too low to be a star so i went for the binoculars. once focused, i was viewing an oval (ish) object hovering with blinking red, blue and magenta like colors. it also had a brighness in the middle. it seemed to change colors in repeating bursts. i went for the telescope in another room. by the time i get it positioned, the "craft" was gone. this was no fixed wing or rotor aircraft. did anyone else see this?
content.summary: Oval, flashing-multi colored lights.

content.detailedDescription: Like i said before one light with no sound turned into 3 lights of different color scanning the ground in a search pattern then turned in to a lighting bolt that went up the river way.
content.summary: Update to my report i made already

content.detailedDescription: Had been looking out my office window on 8th floor in denver periodically during the day, scanning the clear blue sky for high altitude plane like i saw the previous day or a ufo as i have seen others in my past. noticed very bright star-like sized object moving slow from the east to west, slightly erractic. as it was about to leave my field of vision and pass over the building, object changed direction and moved to the left (north), travelling slow. tried to mentally communicate with object and "ask" it to move fast to provide "a better show" as i brought a co-worker over to witness.  this was not my first ufo sighting and i have seen other star-like ones and more dramatic displays so i was not overly excited but believe this was not a satellite nor balloon.
content.summary: Bright star-like object, moving slow, slightly erractic, changed directions

content.detailedDescription: i was doing some yard work on the 23rd,enjoying a beatiful sunny day.I looked up to the northwest and thought i saw a flock of geese flying towards me about 1/4 mile away. it was'nt a flock of geese. it was some sort of a v-shaped object. it came in slowly,like it was floating,to about 1/8 of a mile north of me. the front or tip of it was dark and going back on each wing were light and dark stripes. the light and dark stripes went across each wing about four times,like little segments. it was silent,i did't hear anything coming from it. so this object comes in from the northwest to about 1/8 of a mile from me,up in the air about 500ft. then it turns to my right and moves to the east. through the turn the object stayed parallel to the ground. now the strange part. it had moved about 200ft. to the east and then just vanished. i waited a few seconds and was about to get back to the yard work when all of a sudden there it was again in the same area of the sky,but now going west. i really started to watch it now. it did a flip or a tight roll and was going east again, disappeared again and reappeared going west. it did this 3 or 4 times,along with twisting and turning from east to west. i went in the house to get some binos' for a better look,but it was gone when i came back outside. i'd estimate the wingspan at about 100ft. or more,it was big. a nice,cloudless sunny day that i'll never forget.
content.summary: I observed a  v-shaped object  in the north sky that was disappearing and reappearing into view multiple times.

content.detailedDescription:
View immage.
i have request info to aereonautica militare decimomannu
not response
content.summary: White sphere cagliari

content.detailedDescription: Went outside for lunch and looked up and saw a military jet following a round / oval object to the east for a few seconds. then the object changed its direction and headed to the west at a high rate of speed with no sound and no vapor trail quicker than anything i have ever seen.It seemed to be rotating counter clock wise as it moved in west toward the ocean. my wife called me when it was happening and she was headed north on i-15 and i asked her if she had seen anything as she drove by the area i was at, she said she didn't. i was explaining what i had seen to her and she told me to hold on. at that point she was up near lake hodges and said "i see some kind of object over the lake that looks like a silver orb". i told her to take a picture so she went to look again as she was driving and lost sight of it. i have seen a lot of weird things in my life but nothing ever so clear and intimidating as this it moved with such power and grace that it really shocked me for the few minutes that i saw it. it was one of the clearest days of the year not a cloud in the sky and it was also the fact that it was as large as the plane that seemed to be following it for the few seconds before in reversed its direction that i think i should report it. im very interested in knowing what it was to the point that im writing this email. im not going to consent to a third party release because the explanation for third party is to vague but if someone want to contact me by email and leave a number to call back i would consent to that. i just dont want to be harassed by tellimarkiters or someone else that dosnt have anything do to with your web site.
content.summary: Looked up in the sky
